rows.label: qst200201_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, Rex. If we go to Eden, will
people truly be able to become happy?

rows.label: qst200201_msg0002
rows.name:
That, I don't know yet,
but[ML:Dash ] I believe so.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0005
rows.name:
I have completed many missions
and seen various people[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200201_msg0006
rows.name:
In this world, there are many people
suffering for various reasons.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0007
rows.name:
Some were deceived by others and
chased from their homes, some
killed others in order to survive[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200201_msg0008
rows.name:
Some even betrayed their
families for money[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200201_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to shout some
sense into all of them!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0011
rows.name:
I want to correct their hearts
with my burning passion!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0013
rows.name: Help the weak, crush the strong!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0014
rows.name: I think that is what my power is for.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0015
rows.name:
To light the hot fire of justice in this
world, I'm counting on your solid support!
That's what I wanted to tell.
